item.title: 美敦力糖尿病业务MiniMed寻求在美国IPO募资7.84亿美元
item.description: 糖尿病管理公司MiniMed集团公司即将从医疗巨头美敦力公司剥离独立，该公司计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达7.84亿美元资金。【原文：MiniMed Group Inc., a diabetes management firm that will be separated from health-care giant Medtronic Plc, is seeking to raise as much as $784 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 阿布扎比王室支持的医疗公司试探信贷投资者
item.description: 一家由阿布扎比王室支持的中东医疗服务提供商正首次寻求从国际固定收益投资者处筹集资金。【原文：A Middle East healthcare provider backed by Abu Dhabi royalty is looking to raise cash from international fixed-income investors for the first time.】

item.title: 为何杰米·戴蒙对信贷市场的疑虑有充分依据
item.description: 随着流动性提供者日益被流动性需求者取代，公司债券面临急剧下跌的风险。【原文：Corporate bonds are exposed to abrupt downside as liquidity providers are increasingly replaced by liquidity takers.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德收购芯片租赁公司Ori，加速押注人工智能
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司收购了云计算企业Ori Industries，押注政府和科技公司将需要芯片来赢得日益激烈的智能竞赛。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management bought cloud-computing firm Ori Industries in a bet that governments and tech companies will need chips to win an escalating artificial-intelligence race.】

item.title: 诺和诺德明年将大幅下调Wegovy和Ozempic在美国市场的定价
item.description: 诺和诺德公司计划明年大幅下调其重磅产品Wegovy和Ozempic在美国市场的定价，这家制药企业正努力在肥胖症治疗领域夺回更大市场份额。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S plans to slash the US list prices for its blockbusters Wegovy and Ozempic next year as the drugmaker struggles to claw back a larger share of the obesity market.】

item.title: 匈牙利央行降基准利率，因通胀降至目标值以下
item.description: 匈牙利央行在通胀率跌破央行目标后，时隔近一年半首次下调基准利率。【原文：Hungary’s central bank cut its key interest rate for the first time in almost a year and a half, after the inflation rate fell below the central bank’s target.】

item.title: 人工智能图像先驱初创公司推出加速聊天技术
item.description: 斯特凡诺·埃尔蒙曾协助开发了被主流人工智能服务用于生成图像和视频的核心技术。如今，他创立的初创公司Inception正致力于革新人工智能处理文本的方式。【原文：Stefano Ermon helped pioneer technology that’s used by popular artificial intelligence services to generate images and videos. Now his startup, Inception, is vying to change how AI handles text.】

item.title: ADT收购初创公司，该企业运用人工智能技术揭示触发运动传感器的诱因
item.description: 安防公司ADT以1.7亿美元收购人工智能初创企业Origin Wireless，此举将使其热门的家庭安防产品得以升级，新增人工智能功能。【原文：Security company ADT Inc. has bought AI startup Origin Wireless Inc. for $170 million in a deal that will allow it to upgrade its popular home security products with new artificial intelligence features.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司MatX完成5亿美元融资，将与英伟达展开竞争
item.description: 由谷歌半导体业务部门两位前员工创立的人工智能芯片初创公司MatX，在最新融资轮中筹集了超过5亿美元资金，用于生产与英伟达公司竞争的硬件产品。【原文：MatX, an AI chip startup founded by two alumni of Google’s semiconductor business, has raised more than $500 million in a new funding round to produce hardware that competes with Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: Stripe估值飙升至1590亿美元，支付交易量激增
item.description: Stripe公司联合创始人兼总裁约翰·科利森在接受采访时表示，这家帮助企业在线收款的公司在员工要约收购中估值已达1590亿美元。【原文：Stripe Inc., which helps businesses accept payments online, has reached a $159 billion valuation in an employee tender offer, co-founder and president John Collison said in an interview.】

item.title: 美联储官员古尔斯比称关税裁决或有助于抑制通胀
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比表示，最高法院推翻特朗普总统多项全球性关税的裁决可能给企业带来更多不确定性，但也可能有助于抑制通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said the Supreme Court’s decision to strike down many of President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs may cause more uncertainty for businesses but could also help cool inflation.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：AMD、Blue Owl、BWX、Keysight、Kratos、Vir
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7:45，标普500指数期货基本持平，此前因人工智能担忧引发的抛售潮已于周一出现。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures are little changed as of 7:45 a.m. in New York after Monday’s selloff on AI fears.】

item.title: 新兴市场股票创下新高，亚洲科技股涨势持续
item.description: 周二，新兴市场股市再创历史新高。亚洲科技股的持续上涨使该板块摆脱了困扰华尔街的人工智能担忧。在货币方面，随着春节假期后内地交易重启，人民币汇率走强。【原文：Emerging-market stocks scaled another record high Tuesday, as fresh gains in Asian tech allowed the sector to shrug off the AI concerns that have weighed on Wall Street, while on currencies, China’s yuan firmed as mainland trading resumed after the Lunar New Year break.】

item.title: 中国大疆将无人机禁令诉讼诉至联邦通信委员会上诉法院
item.description: 中国无人机制造商深圳大疆创新科技有限公司向美国第九巡回上诉法院提交请愿书，对联邦通信委员会将其列入所谓"受管制实体名单"的决定提出质疑。该名单将阻止其产品在美国获得新设备认证。【原文：Chinese drone-maker SZ DJI Technology Co. filed a petition with the US Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit, challenging the Federal Communications Commission’s decision to add the company to its so-called covered entity list, a designation that blocks new equipment authorizations for its products in the US.】

item.title: 惠誉警告：加蓬面临违约风险，因国际货币基金组织计划存在不确定性
item.description: 惠誉评级认为加蓬存在违约的"内在风险"，因为这个产油国是否会正式向国际货币基金组织寻求援助计划仍存在不确定性。【原文：Fitch Ratings sees an “inherent risk” of default by Gabon as uncertainty persists over whether the oil-producing nation will formally ask the International Monetary Fund for a program.】

item.title: 墨西哥月中通胀数据或使三月降息计划保持可能性
item.description: 墨西哥2月初整体通胀增速略高于预期，而核心通胀数据则小幅回落，这可能使央行在3月降息的可能性依然存在。【原文：Mexico headline inflation sped up slightly faster than expected in early February while the core readings eased marginally, potentially keeping a March interest rate cut by the central bank in play.】

item.title: OTP银行首席执行官表示，该行正将中亚地区作为下一阶段扩张的目标市场。
item.description: 匈牙利最大贷款机构OTP银行正将收购目标锁定中亚地区，力图复制其在东欧成为第二大银行的扩张策略。【原文：OTP Bank Nyrt., Hungary’s largest lender, is honing in on central Asia for acquisitions as it seeks to replicate an expansion strategy that’s made it the second-biggest bank in eastern Europe.】

item.title: 十年美国液化天然气如何重塑全球天然气格局
item.description: 美国在液化天然气贸易中占据主导地位，无论从贸易量还是灵活性来看都是如此。【原文：The US dominates liquefied natural gas trade in terms of volumes and flexibility.】

item.title: 印度倡导包容性人工智能以对抗美中主导地位
item.description: 人工智能影响峰会暴露了人们在资本密集型技术竞赛中被甩在后面的担忧【原文：AI impact summit exposed fears of being left behind in capital-intensive tech race】

item.title: 人工智能会计初创企业Basis估值达11.5亿美元
item.description: 人工智能会计初创企业Basis凭借新一轮融资跻身独角兽行列，人工智能技术的进步正撼动金融服务市场格局。【原文：AI-for-accounting startup Basis has surged to unicorn status with a new funding round as advances in artificial intelligence rattle the financial services markets.】

item.title: 特朗普为美国经济背书，尽管经济尚未完全复苏
item.description: 总统将在周二向国会发表的国情咨文演讲中，着力宣传本国经济取得的成就。【原文：The president will aim to sell a message of economic success in his state-of-the-union speech Tuesday before Congress.】

item.title: 特朗普暗示企业申请关税退税将面临漫长艰难的斗争
item.description: 贝森特将关税返利称为"企业福利"，而国会对此兴趣寥寥【原文：Bessent spins tariff returns as ‘corporate welfare’ while Congress shows little interest】

item.title: JDE Peet’s助力KDP业绩增长，2026年展望乐观
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper公司对全年销售额作出乐观预测，称其计划于2026年下半年收购荷兰咖啡制造商JDE Peet's NV，此举将为公司业绩带来提振。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. offered an upbeat forecast for its full-year sales, saying it expected a boost from its planned purchase of Dutch coffee maker JDE Peet’s NV later in 2026.】

item.title: 萨克斯全球首席执行官称顶级品牌破产后仍在发货
item.description: 萨克斯全球企业表示，包括博柏利以及奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团和开云集团旗下品牌在内的数百个品牌，已恢复或继续向这家陷入困境的零售商供货，该公司正试图摆脱破产困境。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises said hundreds of brands, including Burberry and those owned by luxury powerhouses LVMH and Kering, have either resumed or continued shipping to the troubled retailer as it tries to emerge from bankruptcy.】

item.title: Meta将斥资数十亿美元收购AMD设备并购入股票
item.description: Meta Platforms公司将部署基于AMD处理器的6吉瓦级数据中心设备，这项重磅交易标志着这家芯片制造商在追赶英伟达公司方面取得重大进展。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will deploy 6 gigawatts’ worth of data center gear based on processors from Advanced Micro Devices Inc., a blockbuster deal that marks a win for the chipmaker’s attempts to catch up with Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 美国国债涨幅收窄，关键收益率徘徊在4%附近
item.description: 美国国债持稳，因避险需求减弱，投资者将关注点转向债券的短期风险。【原文：US Treasuries steadied as demand for havens eased and investors focused on the near-term risks for bonds.】

item.title: 瑞士债券市场瞄准爆发式销售，得益于谷歌母公司Alphabet的首次公开募股
item.description: 今年瑞士法郎计价的企业债券发行规模可能突破250亿，远超市场常规水平。若这种避险货币的低利率吸引更多国际借款人效仿谷歌母公司Alphabet Inc.进入市场，这一数字或将进一步攀升。【原文：Corporate bond sales in Swiss francs could top 25 billion this year, far beyond the market’s normal volumes if the haven currency’s low interest rates spur more international borrowers to follow Google parent Alphabet Inc. in to the market.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席投资官称中国吸引力增强，资金流入持续增长
item.description: 德意志银行私人银行全球首席投资官克里斯蒂安·诺尔廷表示，中国的科技实力正使该国成为越来越有吸引力的投资目的地。【原文：China’s tech prowess is making the country an increasingly attractive investment destination, according to Christian Nolting, Deutsche Bank AG’s global chief investment officer for private banking.】

item.title: 安培体育股价下跌，因前景黯淡引发成本担忧
item.description: 安培体育公司股价下跌，此前该公司发布的第一季度业绩展望低于预期，市场担忧其推广萨洛蒙鞋类和始祖鸟服装品牌将导致成本上升。【原文：Amer Sports Inc. shares fell after the company issued a first-quarter outlook that trailed expectations, raising concerns on higher costs to promote its Salomon footwear and Arc’teryx apparel brands.】
